Recommendation: Safe to transit. Adequate UKC with current tide. Proceed via BMCT Deep Water Approach.
UNSAFE: Insufficient UKC at low tide. Delay transit until tide reaches 2.5m minimum.
Safe to transit. Good UKC margin. Normal approach via BMCT channel.
Safe to transit. Comfortable UKC margins at current tide.
Safe to transit. Excellent UKC. Can proceed at any tidal state.
Safe but monitor tide. Adequate UKC with current high tide. Avoid transit at low tide.
WARNING: Marginal UKC in Shallow Water Channel. Transit only during high tide (>3.0m).
Safe to transit at any tide. Large UKC margin for feeder vessel.
Safe to transit. Higher UKC requirement for tanker met. Proceed to Liquid Cargo Jetty.
Safe to transit. Good UKC margins for chemical tanker. Standard escort protocols.
